lead_paragraph: An article on Tuesday about concerns over the health of Harlan Chamberlain, the father of Yankees pitcher Joba Chamberlain, misstated part of the name of the hospital in Lincoln, Neb., where he was admitted last week. It is St. Elizabeth Regional Medical Center, not St. Vincent.
